title: Didnt know darren aronofsky but now i know !
review: After seeing that movie i was like -who the hell made that movie ! The message is so powerful and the director darren aronofsky creativity was so ahead of his time .

title: Jared leto acting skills = amazing
review: Jared leto in that role was legendary !!!! Compare to his other role i think that one he was perfect in it . All the manoeuvers and the way he act in that persona was perfectly made.

title: What movie industry is missing nowadays
review: This is exactly the type of movie the new era cinema need ... Magic!
